title: Daily Snippet
content:
--- title: "Daily snippet" kind: article created_at: 2014-05-31 08:23:00 UTC author: Ayush (PTZ/Serial Extension) image: https://avatars0.githubusercontent.com/u/4787914?s=50 categories: GSoC-2014-HDMI2USB tags: "news hdmi2usb ptz serial-extension" layout: post ---

  • Finished with gitimmersion. That was a good tutorial, would recommend to anyone
  • Problems with ISE not working. The download appears to be corrupt, MD5 doesn't match. Redownloading
  • Began with circuit design. Wondering if RJ-11 support to be given.
Originally posted on Serial port expansion for HDMI2USB with PTZ camera control example
